name: Sunset Forest
description:
I know it’s probably more like a development diary rather than game description but the game itself is also much more important as the first experience of the new and young “Thirty-Three Studio” than just one more platformer on the indie market. Thank you for your reading this message, it is very important for us to meet any feedback to stay on this hard path to our dreams…

 

 (Hope these Words will be true soon :) )

But after months of producing new ideas, art, sounds, code and just months of our lives we are here… Ready to pull that trigger off, releasing the game on the itch.io for the first time. I just want to say: “Thank you guys! We have done it together and we have done it well!”
